inclusion.criterion: Subject and/or parent/legally acceptable representative can comply with requirements
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of investigational or non-registered product within 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic administration of immunosuppressants within six months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia, but no history of meningococcal disease or previous vaccination with meningococcal polysaccharide vaccine. He was previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
